To verify this account we’ll withdraw $0.01 and then refund the charge. Make sure you have at least $1.00 in your bank account to prevent your bank verification from failing due to insufficient funds.
The account numbers you entered were not the same. Please double-check and correct them.

{name} ({serial_number}) is currently paired with another Point of Sale. ‘Forget’ the reader from the other Point of Sale or reset the reader by holding down the power button until the lights flash red.
Square failed to pair with {name} ({serial_number}). Press and hold the power button until the lights continuously flash red.
Please update Square in order to use your Square Reader for Contactless + Chip Cards
To accept payments with Square, you must first close any audio recording apps. Please restart your device if this message persists.

Action needs to be taken on the payment device.

Coupons can only be applied to a purchase if the total is $1.00 or more after the coupon has been applied. All coupons are single use only and not transferable.

Receive email receipts when your saved card is used for purchases.

By providing your email address, you agree that {merchant_name} may send you messages via Square. See your digital receipt for privacy policy and preferences.

You are about to delete this customer profile. This can’t be undone.
Sorry, customer could not be deleted. Please try again later.
Sorry, customer could not be loaded. Please try again later.
Sorry, customer could not be saved. Please try again later.
An error occurred, please try again later.
Sorry, conversation could not be loaded. Please try again later.
Sorry, this customer does not allow responses.
Are you sure you want to void {number} coupons? This action can’t be undone.
Are you sure you want to void the coupon? This action can’t be undone.

By providing your contact information, you agree businesses you frequent may send you digital receipts, marketing, and messages via Square. See your digital receipt for privacy policy and preferences.

Your information will be used by Square and this merchant to provide their services. By providing your contact information, you agree this merchant and other Square merchants may send you digital receipts and messages via Square. See your digital receipt for Square’s Privacy Policy and preferences.

By providing your contact information, you agree this merchant and other merchants using Square may send you digital receipts and messages via Square. See your digital receipt for Square’s Privacy Policies and preferences.

Your information will be used by Square and this merchant to provide their services. By providing your contact information, you agree this merchant and other Square merchants may send you digital receipts and messages via Square. Your contact information is not visible to other Square merchants unless you provide it directly to that merchant. See your digital receipt for Square’s Privacy Policy and preferences.
Let’s stay in touch! Join our mailing list for news and offers.
Sorry, groups could not be loaded. Please try again.
Sorry, group could not be saved. Please try again.
The loyalty account for {phone_number} will be deleted. This action can’t be undone.
Failed to delete Loyalty Account. Please try again.
Tapping send will trigger an SMS to {phone} with their current loyalty balance.
This customer has no upcoming expirations.
Sorry, note could not be deleted. Please try again.
Sorry, note could not be saved. Please try again.
This will remove the selected file from {customer_name}’s profile. This action can’t be undone.
Sorry, message could not be sent. Please try again.
Messages should not be used to send marketing communications.
The phone {number} is associated with another customer’s loyalty account.
We’re sorry, but something went wrong.
This is the phone number used to earn {plural_points_terminology} and rewards.
This is the phone number used to earn stars and rewards.
This cash drawer was closed remotely. Start a new cash drawer to continue.
Save a card to this customer in the customer directory before or after a sale. To learn more about cards on file, visit the {support_center}.
This Square location cannot process payments using the Square Reader SDK. It may be registered in a country where use of the SDK is not supported.
{operation_name} was called from an activity that is already destroyed.
This device is already authorised for a Square location. To authorise with a different location, call AuthorisationManager#deauthorise() first.

The provided amount is above the maximum amount allowed for cards at the authorised Square location. Add at least one AdditionalPaymentType or check the maximum amount with Location#getMaximumCardPaymentAmountMoney before starting a transaction.

The provided amount is below the minimum amount allowed for card payments at the authorised Square location. Add at least one AdditionalPaymentType or check the minimum amount with Location#getMinimumCardPaymentAmountMoney before starting a transaction.
Authorisation is already in progress. Please wait for AuthorisationManager#authorise to complete.
The Square Reader SDK could not complete the authorise request because there was no network connection.

The authorised Square location is not activated for card processing. Please check whether the location can process cards using Location#isCardProcessingActivated. Merchants can complete the activation process at https://www.squareup.com/activate
A checkout operation is already in progress and a card has been presented for payment. Ensure that the in-progress checkout is complete before calling CheckoutManager#startCheckoutActivity again.

This device must be authorised with a Square location in order to take payments. Obtain an authorisation code for a Square location from the mobile/authorisation-code endpoint and then call AuthorisationManager#authorise.
Square Reader SDK authorisation codes are one-time-use only. This authorisation code has already been used to authorise a device.
{operation_name} was called from a context that has a loop through its context delegation chain.
{operation_name} must be called with a context that is either an activity or a context wrapping an Activity
{operation_name} was attempted from a null context.
Authorisation is currently in progress. Please wait for AuthorisationManager#authorise to complete.

The Square Reader SDK cannot deauthorise because there are asynchronous payments on this device waiting to upload to Square servers. This can happen when the device is having network connection issues.
{operation_name} was called a second time before a previous call was able to execute.
The provided authorisation code is an empty string.
The provided custom tip percentages array is empty. You must provide one or more tip percentages or enable custom tips. Alternatively, disable tipping with CheckoutParameters.Builder#noTip.
This authorisation code has expired. Square Reader SDK authorisation codes are short-lived and should not be stored.
The presented gift card does not have sufficient funds to complete the transaction, and split tender is disabled. Enable split tender to avoid this error.
The authorisation code is invalid. The authorisation code may have been requested with a Square Application ID different from the one associated with this application.
The provided currency code does not match the currency of the authorised Square location. Check the currency of the authorised location with CurrencyCode#current.
The provided customer id does not match any known customer. Probably it is just an incorrect value, but it may be that the customer has been deleted since you got the identifier.
The provided tip percentages are invalid. Please provide percentages with values between 1 and 100, inclusive.
The amount must not be negative.
This operation was attempted on a thread that is not the main thread.
The provided authorisation code is null.
ReaderSettingsActivity was cancelled by the user.

This device must be authorised with a Square location in order to connect a reader. Obtain an authorisation code for a Square location from the mobile/authorisation-code endpoint and then call AuthorisationManager#authorise.
The checkout operation was cancelled because another call to CheckoutManager#startCheckoutActivity was made before the checkout operation could complete.
The user cancelled the storage of card-on-file information.
The Square Reader SDK could not complete the store card request because there was no network connection.
Too many tip percentages were provided. Please provide up to 3 tip percentages.
The Square Reader SDK encountered an unexpected error. Please contact Square developer support via http://squareup.com/help/contact
Square could not retrieve the result for {operation_name} because the installed fragment has been replaced.

Payments taken before 5:00 pm PT / 8:00 pm ET will be available in your bank account the next business day. Payments taken after 5:00 pm PT / 8:00 pm ET will be available in your bank account by the second business day. If you set your Close of Day after 5:00 pm PT / 8:00 pm ET, sales for your entire day will be available the second business day.

Payments taken before 12 AM Melbourne time will be available in your bank account the next business day. Payments taken after 12 AM Melbourne time will be available in your bank account by the second business day. If you set your Close of Day after 12 AM Melbourne time, sales for your entire day will be available the second business day.

Payments taken before 24:00 will be available in your bank account the next business day. Payments taken after 24:00 will be available in your bank account by the second business day. If you set your Close of Day after 24:00, sales for your entire day will be available the second business day.
Your Current Balance is Active Sales plus all Pending Deposits — all your sales that Square hasn’t yet sent to your bank account.
Your Current Balance is all your sales that Square hasn’t yet sent to your bank account.
Square deposits your eligible balance into your linked bank account after you’ve manually triggered an Instant Deposit.
Square deposits your eligible balance into the bank account associated with your linked debit card after you’ve manually triggered an Instant Deposit.
Something went wrong. Please contact the developer of this application and provide them with this error code: {debug_code}
The fingerprint of your app cannot be verified.
The CUSTOMER_ID parameter was passed, but the merchant account does not support Customer Management.
{error_description} Ensure your registered Package Name is {package_name} and the associated Fingerprint is {fingerprint} on https://connect.squareup.com/apps/{client_id}/point-of-sale-api.
The LOCATION_ID parameter does not match the ID of the business location currently logged in to Square Point of Sale.
The API version value does not match the provided request intent keys.
The amount to be charged must be a non-negative integer.
The app client id is unknown.
The CURRENCY_CODE parameter is {parameter}, which does not match the currency of the logged in merchant: {merchant_currency}.
The app fingerprint does not match any of the expected fingerprints.
The CLIENT_ID parameter is a sandbox ID. Sandbox IDs are not supported in Point of Sale API. Please use a production client ID.

Point of Sale API must be started with startActivityForResult() in the same task. It looks like the caller either used startActivity() or used startActivityForResult() from a finished activity or with the FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK flag.
The AUTO_RETURN_TIMEOUT_MS parameter must be non-negative.
The CALLBACK_URL parameter does not match any of the expected web callback URLs. Register a callback URL in the Square Developer Portal.
The API Version parameter must be set.
The TOTAL_AMOUNT parameter must be set.
The CLIENT_ID parameter must be set.
The CURRENCY_CODE parameter must be set.
Square Point of Sale did not provide a result.
Cannot retrieve the app signature, is it signed?
The TENDER_TYPES parameter must contain at least one known tender type.
The callback_url parameter must be set for Web API requests.
An employee passcode must be entered in to Square Point of Sale.
Square Point of Sale could not connect to the internet.
Square Point of Sale could not connect to its servers.
The NOTE parameter is longer than 500 characters
The AUTO_RETURN_TIMEOUT_MS parameter is greater than 10000 ms (inclusive).
The AUTO_RETURN_TIMEOUT_MS parameter is lower than 3200 ms.
A transaction is already in progress.
This transaction was cancelled because a newer request was made before this transaction could complete.
The app package name is unknown.
The installed version of Square is too old, it doesn’t support this version of the Point of Sale SDK.
Web API is not supported in the supplied API_VERSION parameter. Please update the API_VERSION to at least v1.3.
The merchant must be logged in to Square Point of Sale.
Are you sure you want to discard the payment?
Are you sure you want to discard the entire payment?
We encountered an error loading this file. Please try again.
Please show the following screen to the customer until this payment is completed
Please update Square in order to get the latest firmware for your Square Reader for Chip Cards
Please insert the card to continue.
The attached reader is not yet supported on this device.
This chip card must be inserted.
This is your final PIN attempt.
For your security, this reader has been deactivated. To request a replacement, please contact Support.
This card must swiped to search.
This card must be tapped or swiped to search.
Return to checkout to tap card if it supports contactless payments or try a different payment method.
Square does not currently support this chip card.
Please disconnect and reconnect the reader.
This card cannot be used for this contactless transaction. Insert chip card or return to checkout to try a different payment method or contactless card.
Please enable location services, device storage and phone access to accept payments with Square.
Expiration date M M / Y Y
{points_terminology} expire {expiration_period} {expiration_unit} after earning at the end of the month.
This version of the Square card reader is no longer supported. Request the latest reader for free now to continue accepting credit cards.
Cart exceeds the gift card activation limit.
Plug in the reader via USB\nto charge the battery.
An update to Square is required to use Instant Deposit.
{balance_description} Funds will be sent to the bank account linked to your debit card ending in {pan_suffix}. You can change your linked debit card in {deposits_settings}.
{balance_description} Funds will be available in your {bank_name} account ending in •••••{account_number_suffix} within 20 minutes. You can change your linked bank account in {bank_account_settings}.
To instantly deposit funds, visit the Transactions section of this app.
Instant Deposit allows you to deposit your balance immediately - even on weekends, and costs {fee} of each deposit. Enable Instant Deposit to deposit funds from {transactions}.
Instant Deposit allows you to deposit your balance immediately - even at weekends and costs {fee} of each deposit. Enable Instant Deposit to deposit funds from {transactions} or {deposits}.

Instant Deposit allows you to deposit your balance immediately and costs {fee} of each deposit. Funds are available in your bank account in 20 minutes or less. Enable Instant Deposit to deposit funds from {transactions}. Your opt in to the Instant Deposit service constitutes your acceptance of the {instant_deposit_terms}.

Instant Deposit allows you to deposit your balance immediately and costs {fee} of each deposit. Funds are available in your bank account in 20 minutes or less. Enable Instant Deposit to deposit funds from {transactions} or {deposits}. Your opt in to the Instant Deposit service constitutes your acceptance of the {instant_deposit_terms}.
Instantly deposited funds will be sent to the account linked to this debit card.
Instant Deposit requires a supported debit card to deposit funds into your associated bank account.
A network error occurred, please try again later.
Instant Deposit allows you to deposit your balance immediately - even at weekends. Enable Instant Deposit to deposit funds from {transactions}.
Instant Deposit allows you to deposit your balance immediately - even at weekends. Enable Instant Deposit to deposit funds from {transactions} or {deposits}.

Instant Deposit allows you to deposit your balance immediately. Funds are available in your bank account in 20 minutes or less. Enable Instant Deposit to deposit funds from {transactions}. Your opt in to the Instant Deposit service constitutes your acceptance of the {instant_deposit_terms}.

Instant Deposit allows you to deposit your balance immediately. Funds are available in your bank account in 20 minutes or less. Enable Instant Deposit to deposit funds from {transactions} or {deposits}. Your opt in to the Instant Deposit service constitutes your acceptance of the {instant_deposit_terms}.
Instant Deposit is not currently available. Please contact Square Support for more information.
Please click the link in the email within 24 hours to verify your debit card. If you don’t receive an email, it may be in your spam folder.
The 16 digit card number you entered is invalid. Please verify the information, or continue adding for 19 digit cards.
Please enter a valid email address.
Please enter a valid routing number.

To protect buyers and sellers, Square requires Location Services to be turned on at all times.

Please enter the account holder’s name.
Unfortunately Square was unable to update properly. Please visit the Google Play Store™ to uninstall and reinstall the app.
WARNING: There are unprocessed payments stored on this device. Do not uninstall Square until all payments have been processed, or the unprocessed payments will be lost.
Please check your network settings and try again later.
Contactless payment applications on your phone like Android Pay may try to complete transactions on your Square Reader. We recommend you disable contactless in your device settings.
This device does not have any apps available for previewing this file. You may be able to download one from the Play Store.
This device does not have any apps available for previewing an image. You may be able to download one from the Play Store.

Processing App Data in the Background
Square magstripe-only card readers in Japan will be declined after March 31, 2016. To continue accepting credit card payments, please switch to a Square chip card reader.
Gift cards can’t be purchased while offline.
Manually entered cards cannot be accepted in offline mode.
Visit Settings to set a per transaction limit. For more information, visit the {support_center}.
This card cannot be accepted while offline.
This transaction exceeds the limit defined for offline mode.
Offline mode can’t be initiated at this time. Reconnect to the Internet to refresh this device and process further payments.

Offline Mode enables you to accept swiped card payments at your normal processing rates when your Internet service is temporarily unavailable. Transactions are processed when you regain Internet connectivity and will expire if not processed within 72 hours.{section_break}By enabling Offline Mode, you are responsible for any expired or declined transactions taken while offline.
Reconnect to the Internet to refresh Square Point of Sale and process further payments.
Signing out will discard 1 ticket. You may not be able to recover this ticket later.
Signing out will discard {ticket_count} tickets. You may not be able to recover these tickets later.
If you would like to order this reader, please try again later from your Square Dashboard.
We modified your address to match what is on file. Please review before you continue.
We were unable to verify your delivery address. Please update it or input a new one.
Square Point of Sale has terminated because your device is out of storage space. Please free some space and try again.
We detected more than one reader in range when pairing. Ensure that the last 4 digits of your reader’s serial number are {serial_number}.
You must enable Bluetooth on your device in order to connect a wireless reader.
The reader’s serial number is printed on the bottom of the reader. {having_trouble}
Press and hold the button on your reader until the lights flash orange, then release the button and place the reader next to this device to pair.
I agree to pay the above total amount according to my card issuer agreement.
Choose between a Traditional Receipt or a Quick Tip receipt which allows customers to simply tick a box.
{brand_and_suffix} has a balance of {auth_amount}, which is less than the required payment.
Partial refunds will not include tax in reports. {learn_more}

Charging cards on file has a processing fee of {cnp_rate} per transaction. To learn more about pricing, visit {help_center}.

Plug in the reader via USB to charge the battery.
Square Reader battery is at {percent}%. Plug in the reader via USB to charge the battery.
The reader is taking a long time to connect. If your reader doesn’t connect, unplug it and plug it back in to try again. If the problem persists, visit the {support_center}.
Please wait while the reader’s firmware is updated. Once this is complete it will reconnect to Square Point of Sale automatically.
Keep Square Point of Sale Open
When in Offline Mode, only magstripe cards are accepted. Restore internet connection to use your Square reader.
When in Offline Mode, only magstripe cards are accepted. Restore internet connection to verify transactions.
This reader is permanently broken. To get a new reader, visit the Support Centre.
Your reader powers off automatically after two hours without use to save battery. Turn on your reader by tapping the button on the side of the reader to connect to Square Point of Sale.
Press Button on Reader to Connect
Unplug the reader, then plug it back in.
Press ‘Forget This Reader’ and try pairing again.
This payment was taken while offline and could not be authorised. {receipt_detail_card_declined_message_learn_more}
This payment was taken while offline and could not be fully authorised. {receipt_detail_card_declined_message_learn_more}
This payment will post once it is fully processed.
This payment can’t be processed until Internet connectivity is restored.\nDo not uninstall Square before the payment has been processed or the payment could be lost.
Transaction {transaction} did not settle with tip. Would you like to retry?
Record non-Square gift card and gift certificate payments.
Amount entered is for tracking purposes only.\nYou will not receive a deposit for this transaction.
By returning an amount, items will not be associated with this refund. This will cause your inventory and item sales reports to be incorrect.
Connect a contactless card reader to process refund.
Square will refund the processing fees associated with this amount.
Please use a valid gift card.
Enter or swipe any gift card for the option of applying the refund to a different card.
Multiple gift cards included in this purchase.
Clear the remaining balance by tapping the gift card items on the previous screen.
Gift cards are not available for refunding split-tender transactions.
Item amount includes taxes and discounts where applicable.
By issuing this refund, I authorise Square to debit the refund amount from the bank account linked to my Square account. {learn_more}
This payment is no longer eligible to be refunded.
These payments are no longer eligible to be refunded.
Ask customer to tap {brand} card {last_four} on the reader to process refund.
Taxes are included in this refund and will be reflected in reporting. {learn_more}
Square will refund the taxes and processing fees associated with this amount.
This payment is awaiting a tip amount. Refunding will settle this payment with no tip.
Max {amount} available for refund to {tender}. Amount includes tax. {learn_more}
Please remove the reader to continue
There was an error restocking your inventory after processing the refund. Please try again.
Please restore Internet connectivity to issue a refund.
Please restore Internet connectivity to settle payments.
Please restore Internet connectivity to settle payments
Please restore Internet connectivity to settle a payment.
Your routing and account numbers cannot be the same.

We are unable to record audio and you will not be able to process swiped payments. Please try restarting your phone. You can manually enter credit card numbers to accept payments, but may be charged a higher rate.
This device is not currently authorised to accept payments with Square.
Customer id supplied does not match any known customer. Please check and correct the ID value.
Could not connect to the network. Please reconnect to the Internet and try again.
The storage of card information was cancelled.
You can enter card numbers manually while you wait for your new reader to arrive.
Your session has expired. Please log in again to continue using Square.
{amount_remaining} of {total} will remain after this transaction.
Are you sure you want to cancel this payment? This action cannot be undone.
Please restore your device’s Internet connection to access split payments.
Square connects wirelessly to the contactless and chip card reader. See the {square_shop} for more details.
Square’s having server issues, please try again later.
Activate your Square Card by swiping it now.
Square can autofill forms like this one with your email to make running your business even simpler.
Square can use your contacts to make populating Invoices a breeze.

Location Services must be turned on at all times when using Square. Square needs to know where transactions take place in order to reduce the risks associated with those transactions and to minimise payment disputes.
Square needs access to your microphone in order to use the magstripe card reader.

Square needs phone access in order to uniquely identify the devices associated with your account and ensure that unauthorised devices are not able to act on your behalf. Square will never use or store your phone number or call history.
Square needs to access the device storage system in order to securely process transactions and prevent malicious code from interfering with Square.
Please turn off TalkBack to continue using the Chip Card Reader.
Reader will not work correctly with TalkBack enabled.
Please contact support for more information.
This amount (including tip) is used for tracking purposes only. You will not receive a deposit for this transaction.
Square’s Offline Mode allows you to accept card payments without Internet connectivity.

We need to update your reader’s firmware. This may take 5 to 10 minutes as the reader reconnects a few times. You can still swipe cards with your magstripe reader during this process. \n\nThe orange status bar at the top of the screen will turn black when the update is finished.
Voiding ticket will cancel all existing item charges and close the ticket immediately.
